mainHero.title: Expert Tax Solutions for Your Business
mainHero.subtitle: Small Business Tax Inc.
mainHero.description: We specialize in tax preparation and strategic financial planning for small businesses and entrepreneurs. With our experienced team, you can focus on growing your business while we handle your taxes.

items.title: Full-Service Tax Preparation
items.description: Accurate and timely filing for LLCs, S-corps, sole proprietors, and more. We ensure compliance while maximizing deductions.

items.title: Tax Planning & Advisory
items.description: Strategic guidance throughout the year to help you reduce liabilities and avoid surprises.

items.title: Bookkeeping & Write-Up
items.description: Ongoing bookkeeping services to support accurate records and informed financial decisions.

items.title: Entity Structuring & Business Consulting
items.description: We help you choose the right legal entity and offer expert advice on business strategy and operations.

items.title: IRS Representation & Audit Support
items.description: Facing an audit? We provide complete support and representation before tax authorities.

items.title: Payroll & Retirement Planning
items.description: Reliable payroll services and employee retirement plan setup, tailored to your business.

features.title: Technology That Works for You
features.subtitle: Streamlined tools for secure, smart, and simple tax filing
features.description: We use a modern, secure, and client-friendly tech stack to make your tax experience effortless, whether you're uploading documents or tracking your filing status.

sections.name: Our Mission
sections.content: At Small Business Tax Inc., our mission is to empower small businesses by taking the stress out of tax season.

sections.name: Experience
sections.content: With over 20 years in tax and accounting, we bring deep expertise to every client interaction.

sections.name: Approach
sections.content: We believe in personalized service, proactive planning, and full transparency.
